item.title: Anaconda packages and environments for bioinformatics: a tutorial
item.author: sciathlonblog@gmail.com
item.description: After abandoning this blog for several years I am back with different content. I want to write tutorials on what I’ve learned doing bioinformatics since I started my PhD, among other things and might be interesting or helpful to others. I started using anaconda during my postdoc in genomics and I use it every single day. Today, I wanted to write a summary of things I’ve learned using anaconda packages and environments for bioinformatics (but the same commands will work for other types of packages as well).
